Title: The Great Banquet
Description: The banquet should be starting any time now. Go find the High Elder and pay your respects. I'll be right behind you.
ObjectivesText: Speak with High Elder Cloudfall at the banquet grounds in the Tian Monastery.
CompletionText:
We will move on to the training soon enough, young $c. First, we must talk, and drink, and eat.

Though I must say, I admire your discipline.
RewardText:
That concludes our introductions. You should be ready to begin your training.

That is... you should be ready to begin your training... AFTER we have one more mug of ale. Perhaps two. Shall we, $n?
